name: CMCKit
summary: API client for CoinMarketCap V2 endpoints
description: CMCKit is a wrapper for CoinMarketCap's new V2 API. V1 is currently still supported, but will be taken offline soon. CMC Kit provides access to the full functionality of CoinMarketCap's V2 API using all of the supported endpoints and request paramters. Additionally, it provides access to some endpoints using custom request parameters to improve usability.
